Di Marzio
The red devils in fact have reached the agreement for Fred, Shakhtar Donetsk midfielder, blown to the cousins â€‹â€‹of the City with a check for 50 million euros.

The Brazilian will form the midfield trio of Mourinho along with Matic and Pogba, considered in turn to be incedible by the former Inter manager. The Milinkovic-Savic idea is exciting, but at the moment it is not the intention of United to spend one hundred million euros for a possible reserve.

On the exits side, Darmian is always closer to Juventus, a club from which Manchester would gladly take Mario Mandzukic, a profile that Mourinho likes looking for an attacker who possesses the characteristics of Croatian. An alternative for that role remains the former Inter Arnautovic striker, currently in power at West Ham.

replies.msg:
GARITANO IN AT SOCIEDAD

Real Sociedad have named Asier Garitano as their new head coach.

The 48-year-old Basque has signed a deal tying him to the LaLiga club until June 30, 2021, Sociedad announced on their website.

He replaces Imanol Alguacil, who had been in temporary charge since Eusebio Sacristan was sacked in March. Sociedad finished 12th in LaLiga this season, having been sixth last term.

Garitano had spent the last five years in charge of surprise package Leganes, guiding Los Pepineros from the third tier to the Spanish top flight for the first time in their history.

Under Garitano, Leganes also reached the semi-finals of the Copa del Rey for the first time this year, knocking out neighbours Real Madrid in the process.

Red Devils boss Jose Mourinho is known to have targeted the Belgium international defender as part of the defensive revamp he is planning at Old Trafford this summer.

It was initially believed the Londoners would accept around £55m for Alderweireld, but chairman Daniel Levy is believed to be seeking closer to the £75m Liverpool paid Southampton for fellow centre-back Virgil van Dijk in January.

Now 29, he moved to White Hart Lane from Atletico Madrid in July 2015 for £11.5m, after an impressive season on loan at Southampton

Douglas Costa to Man United

Jose Mourinho's side are reportedly ready to bid £79 million for the Brazilian winger, should Juventus fail to make their loan of the player from Bayern Munich permanent. Fred: ”My head is in the World Cup. My agents are taking care of it. I try to do my work in the field and leave the extra field for Gilberto Silva. My staff are looking at what is best for me. Who knows after the World Cup I can make the best choice for me.”
